text: Inhon ne apne ulema aur darweshiyon ko Allah ke siwa apna Rubb bana liya hai aur isi tarah Maseeh ibn Maryam ko bhi, halanke inko ek mabood ke siwa kisi ki bandagi karne ka hukum nahin diya gaya tha, woh jiske siwa koi mustahiq e ibadat nahin. Paak hai woh in mushrikana baaton se jo yeh log karte hain
